question.en: Which of these is the least carbon-emitting mode of transportation in Nigeria?
question.yo: Ewo ninu awọn ọna gbigbe wọnyi ni o kere julọ ni itujade kárbọnu ni Naijiria?
question.ig: Kedu n’ime ụzọ njem ndị a na-amụpụta carbon nke kacha nta na Naijiria?
question.ha: Wanne hanyar sufuri ke da mafi karancin fitar da carbon a Najeriya?

explanation.en: Walking produces no carbon emissions, making it the most eco-friendly mode of transportation.
explanation.yo: Rin ko gbejade itujade kárbọnu, eyi ti o jẹ ọna gbigbe ti o dara julọ fun ayika.
explanation.ig: Ịga ije anaghị emepụta carbon, nke na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ụzọ njem kachasị mma n'ebe nchekwa gburugburu.
explanation.ha: Tafiya a kafa ba ta fitar da hayaki mai dumama yanayi, hakan ya sa shi mafi inganci wajen kula da muhalli.

question.en: What is a key benefit of using public buses instead of private cars in Nigeria?
question.yo: Kini anfani pataki ti lilo awọn bọsi gbogbo eniyan dipo awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ ti ara ẹni ni Naijiria?
question.ig: Kedu uru dị mkpa nke iji ụgbọ ala ọha n’ime ụgbọ ala nkeonwe na Naijiria?
question.ha: Me amfanin amfani da motocin bas na jama'a maimakon na mota ta kashin kai a Najeriya?

ig: Na-efu ọnụ dị elu maka mmadụ ọ bụla

explanation.en: Public buses carry multiple passengers at once, reducing the number of cars on the road and traffic congestion.
explanation.yo: Awọn bọsi gbogbo eniyan gbe ọpọlọpọ eniyan ni ẹẹkan, ti o dinku nọmba awọn ọkọ lori ọna ati ijabọ ọna.
explanation.ig: Ụgbọ bọsị ọha na-ebuga ọtụtụ ndị njem otu oge, na-ebelata nọmba ụgbọ ala na ụzọ okporo ụzọ.
explanation.ha: Motar bas na daukar mutane dayawa a lokaci daya, hakan yana rage cinkoso na motocin kan hanya.

question.en: Which government policy can significantly reduce transportation emissions in Nigeria?
question.yo: Eto ijọba wo ni o le dinku awọn itujade gbigbe ni pataki ni Naijiria?
question.ig: Kedu iwu gọọmentị nwere ike belata mmepụta carbon site n'ụzọ njem nke ukwuu na Naijiria?
question.ha: Wanne tsari na gwamnati zai iya rage fitar hayaki sufuri sosai a Najeriya?

yo: Fifi awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ ti ara ẹni pọ si
ha: Yawaitar mallakar mota ta kashin kai

explanation.en: Electric vehicles produce no direct emissions and can significantly reduce Nigeria's transportation-related carbon footprint.
explanation.yo: Awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ amúnìsọ ko gbejade itujade taara ati pe o le dinku ẹsẹ-kárbọnu ti o ni ibatan si gbigbe ni Naijiria.
explanation.ig: Ụgbọ ala eletrik anaghị emepụta ikuku ọkụ ma ọ bụ gas ọkụ ọ bụla, nke nwere ike belata carbon footprint nke ụzọ njem na Naijiria.
explanation.ha: Motocin lantarki basa fitar hayaki kai tsaye kuma zasu iya rage sahihin carbon din sufuri sosai a Najeriya.

question.en: What is the major cause of air pollution from transportation in Nigeria?
question.yo: Kini idi pataki ti ìkòkò afẹfẹ lati gbigbe ni Naijiria?
question.ig: Gịnị bụ isi kpatara mmetọ ikuku sitere na njem na Naijiria?
question.ha: Menene babban sanadin gurbatar iska daga sufuri a Najeriya?

en: Smoke from open burning of waste
yo: Eròjà ẹfin lati ọdọ awọn bọsi
Eru eefi lati inu idẹ ẹgbin ti a ṣii
Eruku lati awọn ọna ti a ko tọjú daradara
ig: Ngwunye ikuku si-esi na ụgbọ bọsị
Anwụ na-ekpo ọkụ si site na ire ihe ọjọọ
Nsụgharị nke okporo ụzọ dị jụụ na-enweghị ndozi
ha: Hayakin iskar da ake fitarwa daga motoci
Tashin hayaki daga shara da aka kona a bude
Fitar da carbon daga motocin sufuri
Tsananin kura daga hanyoyi da ba a gyara sosai ba

answer.ha: Fitar da carbon daga motocin sufuri

explanation.en: Vehicles are a major source of carbon emissions, contributing significantly to air pollution in Nigeria.
explanation.yo: Awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ jẹ orisun pataki ti itujade kárbọnu, eyiti o n ṣe alabapin pupọ si ìkòkò afẹfẹ ni Naijiria.
explanation.ig: Ụgbọ ala bụ isi iyi nke itujade carbon, nke na-eme ka mmetọ ikuku dị na Naijiria dị ukwuu.
explanation.ha: Motocin sufuri suna daga cikin manyan hanyoyin fitar da carbon, suna kara gurbatar iska sosai a Najeriya.

question.en: What Nigerian city has introduced the use of compressed natural gas (CNG) buses to reduce emissions?
question.yo: Ilu Naijiria wo ni o ti ṣe ifilọlẹ lilo awọn bọsi gas adayeba ti a compress (CNG) lati dinku itujade?
question.ig: Kedu obodo Naijiria nke nyere iwu iji bọsị gas a na-agbasa (CNG) belata itujade?
question.ha: Wanne birnin Najeriya ne ya fara amfani da motocin bas na gas da aka matsa (CNG) don rage fitar da hayaki?

explanation.en: Lagos introduced the use of CNG buses to reduce harmful emissions from public transportation.
explanation.yo: Lagos ti ṣe ifilọlẹ lilo awọn bọsi CNG lati dinku awọn itujade iparun lati awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ gbogbo eniyan.
explanation.ig: Lagos nyere iwu iji bọsị CNG belata mmeghachi omume ọjọọ nke ụgbọ njem ọha.
explanation.ha: Lagos ta fara amfani da motocin bas na gas (CNG) don rage fitar da hayaki mai gurbata.

question.en: How can carpooling help reduce transportation-related carbon emissions in Nigeria?
question.yo: Bawo ni pinpin ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ ṣe le ṣe iranlọwọ lati dinku itujade kárbọnu ti o ni ibatan si gbigbe ni Naijiria?
question.ig: Kedu ka ịkekọrịta ụgbọala nwere ike nyere belata itujade carbon nke metụtara njem na Naijiria?
question.ha: Ta yaya amfani da mota daya tsakanin mutane zai taimaka rage fitar hayaki carbon a Najeriya?

en: It reduces the number of vehicles on the road
It encourages more private car ownership
yo: O dinku nọmba awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ lori ọna
O mu ìkòkò afẹfẹ pọ si
O nṣiṣẹ iṣeduro awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ ti ara ẹni
ig: Ọ na-ebelata ọnụ ọgụgụ ụgbọ ala na ụzọ
Ọ na-eme ka mmetọ ikuku dịkwuo elu
Ọ na-agbakwụnye itinye ụgbọ ala nkeonwe
ha: Yana rage adadin motocin da ke kan hanya
Yana karfafa mallakar mota ta kashin kai

answer.en: It reduces the number of vehicles on the road
answer.yo: O dinku nọmba awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ lori ọna
answer.ig: Ọ na-ebelata ọnụ ọgụgụ ụgbọ ala na ụzọ
answer.ha: Yana rage adadin motocin da ke kan hanya

explanation.en: Carpooling reduces the number of vehicles on the road, which helps decrease traffic congestion and carbon emissions.
explanation.yo: Pinpin ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ dinku nọmba awọn ọkọ lori ọna, eyi ti o ṣe iranlọwọ lati dinku ijabọ ọna ati itujade kárbọnu.
explanation.ig: Ịkekọrịta ụgbọala na-ebelata ọnụ ọgụgụ ụgbọ ala na ụzọ, nke na-enyere aka belata mgbago okporo ụzọ na itujade carbon.
explanation.ha: Amfani da mota daya yana rage adadin motocin da ke kan hanya, wanda hakan zai taimaka rage cinkoso da fitar da hayaki carbon.

question.en: What is the environmental impact of using fossil fuel-powered vehicles in Nigerian cities?
question.yo: Kini ipa ayika ti lilo awọn ọkọ ti o ni agbara epo-ara ni awọn ilu Naijiria?
question.ig: Gịnị bụ mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi nke iji ụgbọ ala nwere ike ike mmịpụta ọkụ na obodo Naijiria?
question.ha: Menene tasirin muhalli na amfani da motocin da ke amfani da man fetur a cikin garuruwan Najeriya?

yo: O pọ si itujade gaasi ile-itura
ig: Na-eme ka itujade gas greenhouse dịkwuo elu
Na-eme ka osisi obodo bụrụ nke ọma
Na-eme ka mmanụ mmiri dịkwuo elu
ha: Yana ƙara fitar da hayakin gas greenhouse

answer.yo: O pọ si itujade gaasi ile-itura
answer.ig: Na-eme ka itujade gas greenhouse dịkwuo elu
answer.ha: Yana ƙara fitar da hayakin gas greenhouse

explanation.en: Fossil fuel-powered vehicles emit greenhouse gases like carbon dioxide, which contribute to global warming and environmental degradation.
explanation.yo: Awọn ọkọ ti o ni agbara epo-ara n tu awọn gaasi ile-itura bi kárbọnu dioxide, ti o ṣe alabapin si igbelaruge agbaye ati ibajẹ ayika.
explanation.ig: Ụgbọ ala nke nwere ike ọkụ na-emepụta gas greenhouse dịka carbon dioxide, nke na-eme ka ụwa na-ekpo ọkụ ma na-emebi gburugburu ebe obibi.
explanation.ha: Motocin da ke amfani da man fetur na fitar da hayaki na gas greenhouse kamar carbon dioxide, wanda hakan ke haifar da dumamar duniya da lalacewar muhalli.

question.en: How can electric vehicles (EVs) contribute to reducing transportation-related carbon emissions in Nigeria?
question.yo: Bawo ni awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ itanna (EVs) ṣe le ṣe iranlọwọ lati dinku itujade kárbọnu ti o ni ibatan si gbigbe ni Naijiria?
question.ig: Kedu ka ụgbọ ala eletrik (EVs) nwere ike nyere belata itujade carbon nke metụtara njem na Naijiria?
question.ha: Ta yaya motocin lantarki (EVs) zai taimaka rage fitar da hayaki carbon daga sufuri a Najeriya?

yo: Wọn nlo awọn orisun agbara atunto
ig: Ha na-eme ka mmanụ ọkụ dịkwuo elu
Ha na-eme ka mgbagwoju ụgbọ ala dịkwuo elu
ha: Suna amfani da hanyoyin samar da makamashi masu sabuntawa

answer.yo: Wọn nlo awọn orisun agbara atunto
answer.ha: Suna amfani da hanyoyin samar da makamashi masu sabuntawa

explanation.en: Electric vehicles (EVs) produce little to no emissions when powered by renewable energy sources, helping reduce carbon emissions in transportation.
explanation.yo: Awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ itanna (EVs) ko ṣe itujade awọn gaasi, tabi o kere julọ, nigba ti wọn ba ni agbara lati awọn orisun agbara atunto, eyi ti o ṣe iranlọwọ lati dinku itujade kárbọnu ni gbigbe.
explanation.ig: Ụgbọ ala eletrik (EVs) anaghị emepụta gas, ma ọ bụ na-emepụta obere, mgbe eji ike sitere na oru ike na-emegharịgharị, na-enyere aka belata itujade carbon na njem.
explanation.ha: Motocin lantarki (EVs) suna fitar da ƙanƙara ko kuma babu hayaki yayin da ake amfani da hanyoyin samar da makamashi masu sabuntawa, wanda ke taimakawa rage fitar da hayaki carbon a cikin sufuri.

question.en: Which transportation policy could Nigeria implement to reduce its carbon footprint in the transport sector?
question.yo: Ijọba wo ni Naijiria le ṣe lati dinku ẹsẹ-kárbọnu rẹ ninu eka gbigbe?
question.ig: Kedu iwu nke njem Naijiria nwere ike iweta iji belata ụkpụrụ carbon ha n'ime ngalaba njem?
question.ha: Wanne dokar sufuri Najeriya zata iya aiwatarwa don rage sahihin carbon a cikin sashen sufuri?

yo: Fi owo-ori silẹ fun gbigbe gbogbo eniyan
Pọsi owo-ori lori awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ ti ara ẹni
Kọ awọn ọna ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ diẹ sii
Ṣe agbega lilo awọn kẹkẹ keke
ig: Gbatịa ụtụ isi na ụgbọ ala nkeonwe
ha: Goƙa sabbin hanyoyin sufuri na jama'a
Kara haraji kan motocin kashin kai

answer.yo: Fi owo-ori silẹ fun gbigbe gbogbo eniyan
answer.ha: Goƙa sabbin hanyoyin sufuri na jama'a

explanation.en: By subsidizing public transportation, Nigeria can encourage more people to use buses and trains instead of private vehicles, reducing carbon emissions.
explanation.yo: Nipa fi owo-ori silẹ fun gbigbe gbogbo eniyan, Naijiria le ṣe agbega lilo awọn bọsi ati awọn ọkọ oju-irin ju awọn ọkọ ayọkẹlẹ ti ara ẹni lọ, eyi ti yoo dinku itujade kárbọnu.
explanation.ig: Site na-akwado njem ọha, Naijiria nwere ike ịkwado ndị mmadụ iji bọsị na ụgbọ oloko kama ịnyịnya ụgbọ ala nkeonwe, belata itujade carbon.
explanation.ha: Ta hanyar goƙa sabbin hanyoyin sufuri na jama'a, Najeriya na iya ƙarfafa mutane da dama suyi amfani da bas da jiragen ƙasa maimakon motocin kashin kai, wanda zai rage fitar da hayaki carbon.
